channel.title: Facebook Updates?
channel.description:
Okay so i joined Facebook about a year and a half ago and fell in love. Everything was perfect about it, Everybody left MySpace because of those annoying ass adds, and came to Facebook because it's simpler and more lite. And now the updates begin...
It added the Photo Viewer shit, don't get me wrong it didn't annoy me, but it got to so much people that it reached the local news. People hated it. Okay they got over it...
Then, They delete the "enter" bar and make it so you have to hit the "enter" Key, people started getting confused, then they started a bitch war...
Now, these new Poll questions? Im getting tired, i don't give a fuck if i prefer water or Dr.Pepper. Or Eminem or Lil Wayne. What's your opinion?

item.title: Facebook Updates?
item.dc:creator: @beast_k0 beast k0
item.description:
@beast_k0 wrote:

[quote=“drubrkletern, post:20, topic:388411”][quote author=reyx7 link=topic=484234.msg3548689#msg3548689 date=1301354189]
Am I the only person here that gets on facebook for like 5 minutes to post a status update or comment on someone elses, then leaves? It sounds like you guys spend 2 hours a day there… that’s what Mopar is for
[/quote]
This

Facebook is going Jagex on us.[/quote]

LMFAO!

Read full topic

item.title: Facebook Updates?
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

Slave Scyth:

Nowadays I usually have Facebook open in one tab and MoparScape in another.

This haha. The first thing I do when I open the Internet is open MoparScape and Facebook.

reyx7:

Am I the only person here that gets on facebook for like 5 minutes to post a status update or comment on someone elses, then leaves? It sounds like you guys spend 2 hours a day there… that’s what Mopar is for

I only check for around 5 minutes but I find myself checking the site every 15-30 minutes.

Read full topic

item.title: Facebook Updates?
item.dc:creator: @Slave_Scyth Slave Scyth
item.description:
@Slave_Scyth wrote:

[quote=“noobs are ftw, post:9, topic:388411”]all great sites fail in the end just look at myspace it used to be good[/quote]Psht. Anything Google makes lasts.

Hence why I can’t wait for Google Me.

ziplock:

I still don’t understand why the’re not focusing on the main problems. Like the chat feature, I swear it was programmed by a bunch of chimps shitting on the keyboard.

What’s the problem with the Chat? I see nothing wrong with it, excluding the random times when it says the other person is typing but they’re really not.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @beast_k0 beast k0

item.title: Facebook Updates?
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

All of the updates are trash. They’re focusing on changing the layout more than anything and moving away from what the people want. I still don’t understand why they haven’t added a dislike button since the idea has practically been out there since Facebook started…

Read full topic

item.title: Facebook Updates?
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

I kinda like the polls, mainly because my friends keep making German questions that nobody knows what they mean except for my mom (ex. Du hast durchfall? [You have diarrhea?])

item.title: Facebook Updates?
item.dc:creator: @Mendorphins Mendorphins
item.description:
@Mendorphins wrote:

I hated Facebook, then I got lured into it and still hate it even though it is addictive, and now I hate it even more because of the updates you mentioned plus the fact there is no navigation bar on the top of every page anymore on mobile phones so I have to click on someones name just to get back to home!

Read full topic

item.description:

I hate the photo viewer, but what are the polls? Haven’t encountered one yet…

item.title: Facebook Updates?
item.dc:creator: @Phaze_One Fuscate
item.description:
@Phaze_One wrote:

The photo viewer is useless, the polls are annoying as fuck and we still don’t have a dislike button. My news feed is filled with people liking web pages and voting in useless polls. PICK UP YO ACT
